entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this morning and this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 early this morning then becoming west 20 gusting to 40 late this morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
